# Nolan Hu - AI Automation Engineer

## About
Nolan Hu is an AI automation specialist and full-stack developer based in NYC.
10+ years in financial services (JPMorgan, HSBC, BNY Mellon).
Founder of Sigma Synapses - building AI-powered business solutions.

## Expertise
- RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) architecture
- n8n workflow automation
- Python, TypeScript, React, Next.js
- Claude, OpenAI, xAI API integrations
- Cybersecurity and data analytics

## Recent Achievements
- 3rd Place: MLH x DigitalOcean Hackathon 2025
- DigitalOcean Winner: Hacking with Agents NYC 2025
- BlackHat USA scholarship recipient
